explains: n. [有化] 尼古丁；[有化] 烟碱

sentences.en: A nicotine spray can help smokers quit the habit.
sentences.cn: 一种尼古丁喷剂可以帮助吸烟者戒烟。

sentences.en: Nicotine produces a feeling of well-being in the smoker.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁能让吸烟者产生一种愉悦的感觉。

sentences.en: Nicotine adversely affects the functioning of the heart and arteries.
sentences.cn: 尼古丁对心脏和动脉功能有负面影响。
